SQL_STMT_U.val: select top :2 Docdate,docentry,ItemCode,ModelName from ospk (nolock) where bplid=:1 and Docdate between ':3' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' order by Docdate desc,docentry desc
select top :2 Docdate,docentry,CardCode,CardName,Addr1 from ospk (nolock) where bplid=:1 and Docdate between ':3' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' order by Docdate desc,docentry desc

select UserSA,U_NAME,count(0) from ospk (nolock) left join ousr u (nolock) on u.USERID=ospk.UserSA where bplid=:1 and Docdate between ':2' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' group by UserSA,U_NAME order by u_name

select b.userid,u_name,count(0) from ospk a (nolock), spk1 b (nolock) left join ousr u (nolock) on u.USERID=b.userid where bplid=:1 and b.estdate between ':2' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' and b.DocEntry=a.Docentry and ItemType='S' and LineStatus in('O','C') and FatherLine>=0 group by b.userid,u_name

select top :2 a.Docdate,a.docentry,b.itemCode,b.itemName from ospk a (nolock), spk1 b (nolock) where bplid=:1 and Docdate between ':3' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' and b.DocEntry=a.Docentry and ItemType='I' and LineStatus in ('O','C') and FatherLine>=0 order by Docdate desc,a.docentry desc

select top :2 a.Docdate,a.docentry,b.itemCode,b.itemName from ospk a (nolock), spk1 b (nolock) where bplid=:1 and Docdate between ':3' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' and b.DocEntry=a.Docentry and ItemType='S' and LineStatus in('O','C') and FatherLine>=0 order by Docdate desc,a.docentry desc

select top :2 a.Docdate,a.docentry,b.itemCode,b.itemName from ospk a (nolock), spk1 b (nolock) where bplid=:1 and Docdate between ':3' and cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' and b.DocEntry=a.Docentry and isSubcont='Y' and LineStatus in ('O','C') and FatherLine>=0 order by Docdate desc,a.docentry desc
select top 2 Docdate,docentry,ItemCode,CardCode,ModelName,descrption from ospk (nolock) where bplid=1 and Docdate>cast(SYSDATETIME() as date) and DocStatus<'4' order by Docdate asc
